select MS_BUMON_ID , BUMON_NAME , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS
from MS_BUMON ORDER BY MS_BUMON_ID

select MS_BUMON_ID , BUMON_NAME , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS
from MS_BUMON where MS_BUMON_ID = :MS_BUMON_ID

insert into MS_BUMON ( MS_BUMON_ID , BUMON_NAME , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) values ( :MS_BUMON_ID , :BUMON_NAME , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

update MS_BUMON set BUMON_NAME = :BUMON_NAME ,
SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
where MS_BUMON_ID = :MS_BUMON_ID
